610 Pascal Compiler
  • Prev Package
  • Next Package
  • Frames
  • No Frames
  • All Classes

Package MPC

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ASTVisitor
    This interface defines things common to all AST (Abstract Syntax Tree) visitor classes.
    ObjectVisitor
    This abstract class defines things common to all MPCObject visitor classes.
    Token
    Interface for all token types contained in the 610 Pascal Compiler.
    TokenVisitor
    This interface defines the functionality of all Token visitor classes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ASTNode
    This abstract class defines things common to all AST (Abstract Syntax Tree) nodes.
    ASTNullVisitor
    This abstract class gives default (no work) implementations for AST visitor classes.
    ASTPrintVisitor
    This defines an AST (Abstract Syntax Tree) visitor for printing ASTs.
    Binding
    A Binding consists of an identifier (TokenId) from the Pascal source, plus the (initially null) reference to the Decl node for the declaration that pertains in the context in which the TokenId appears.
    Block
    The class Block represents the declaration part of a Pascal program/function/procedure, in which all objects local to the program/function/procedure are defined, and a statement part, which specifies the actions to be executed upon these objects.
    CaseElement
    A CaseElement gives one case (labels, represented by a CaseLabelList, and a Stmt) of a Pascal CASE statement
    CaseLabelList
    A CaseLabelList contains a list of Expr nodes giving the values that select a particular case of a Pascal CASE statement.
    CUP$Parser$actions
    Cup generated class to encapsulate user supplied action code.
    Decl
    An abstract representation of a Pascal declaration.
    DeclConst
    Represents a constant declaration in Pascal.
    DeclField
    Representation for a field declaration within a record declaration.
    DeclFormal
    Representation of a formal parameter declaration within a function or procedure declaration.
    DeclMember
    Representation for declarations of member-like things (fields, methods)
    DeclMethod
    Representation of a (MiniObject-)Pascal method.
    DeclProcFunc
    Representation forr a procedure/function declaration.
    DeclProgram
    Representation of a program declaration; note that this is just the NAME of the program, and is of little use
    Decls
    The class Decls represents a list of declarations that can occur in a Pascal program.
    DeclSpecial
    Representation of a special declaration (write, readln, etc.).
    DeclType
    Representation for a type declaration.
    DeclVar
    Representation of a variable declaration.
    Expr
    Representation for expressions in Pascal.
    ExprBinary
    Representation for a binary expression.
    ExprBinding
    Representation for an expression binding.
    ExprCall
    Representation of a function or procedure call.
    ExprError
    Represents a parse error.
    ExprId
    Represents an identifier expression.
    ExprInt
    Representation for a literal integer expression.
    ExprNil
    Representation of NIL in a Pascal program.
    Exprs
    Representation of a list of expressions
    ExprString
    Representation of a literal string expression.
    ExprUnary
    Representation of a unary expression.
    InputPos
    A class for packing an source input position (line, column) into a single Java int.
    IntMap<E>
    This is essentially a variant of HashMap for our purposes: (1) We want to be able to look up based on an int, thus avoid making unnecessary objects; (2) Since we are implementing this ourselves, we implement only the functionality we need.
    IntMap.IntMapEntry<E>
    Nested, but not inner, class for entries in the map; we will have buckets that start chains of these entries that have the same hash code for their key
    mpc
    mpc stands for Mini-Pascal Ccompiler.
    MPCContext
    This class maintains flags and similar context for the Mini-Pascal compiler
    MPCObject
    An MPCObject represent the location (or, for constants, the value) of an entity at run time.
    MPCScanner
    Scans an input character stream into Pascal tokens.
    MPCScanner.ClassRange
    Really just a record/struct, indicating that a range of character values (from lo through hi, inclusive) belong to the indicated character class (and are treated equivalently for purposes of scanning).
    MPCScanner.Transition
    Represents a transition to a new State, with a sequence of Actions to take
    MPCStream
    Adds indentation support to a PrintStream; helpful for nicely formatted AST output, etc.
    ObjectValueError
    ObjectValueError is the class of the (unique) error MPCObject
    ObjectValueInteger
    An ObjectValueInteger describes a run-time value that is an integer constant
    ObjectValueString
    An ObjectValueString describes a run-time value that is a string constant
    Overriding
    Representation of a method override
    Parse
    This class drives the semantic checking of the AST.
    Parser
    CUP v0.11a beta 20060608 generated parser.
    Phase<R,A>
    This abstract class provide a standard way of instantiating and invoking a phase of the Mini-Pascal compiler.
    Program
    The class Program represents a Pascal program.
    ScanInStream
    Adds line and column number functionality to an ordinary Java InputStream.
    Stmt
    Abstract class for all statements.
    StmtAssign
    Representation of an assignment statement.
    StmtCall
    Representation of a call statement.
    StmtCase
    Representation of a CASE statement.
    StmtCompound
    Representation of a compound statement.
    StmtEmpty
    Represents an empty statement.
    StmtFor
    Representation of a FOR statement.
    StmtIf
    Representation of an IF statement.
    StmtRepeat
    Representation of a REPEAT statement.
    Stmts
    Representation of a list of statements.
    StmtWhile
    Representation of a WHILE statement.
    StringMap<E>
    This is essentially a variant of HashMap for our purposes: (1) We want to be able to look up based on a reusable StringBuffer, thus avoid making unnecessary objects; (2) Since we are implementing this ourselves, we implement only the functionality we need.
    StringMap.StringMapEntry<E>
    An entry in the StringMap.
    sym
    CUP generated class containing symbol constants.
    TokenId
    TokenId is used to represent an identifier token found in a Pascal program.
    TokenInt
    Token class for integer literals of a Pascal program.
    TokenString
    Representation of string tokens found in a Pascal program.
    Type
    Abstract Representation of a type in the Pascal language as defined by the Pascal User Manual and Report.
    TypeArray
    Representation of an array type.
    TypeError
    TypeError represents the result of certain parsing or semantic errors, particularly errors in type checking a construct; it has a single instance, theErrorType
    TypeId
    Represents a user defined type identifier.
    TypeObject
    Representation of a (MiniObject-)Pascal object type.
    TypeObjectPointer
    Representation of a Mini-Object-Pascal pointer-to-object type.
    TypePointer
    Representation of a Pascal pointer type.
    TypePrim
    Represents a (Mini-)Pascal primitive type.
    TypePrimBool
    Represents the (Mini-)Pascal primitive type Boolean.
    TypePrimInt
    Represents the (Mini-)Pascal primitive type INTEGER.
    TypePrimNil
    Represents the (Mini-)Pascal primitive type for Pascal NIL.
    TypePrimString
    Represents the (Mini-)Pascal primitive type for Pascal string constants.
    TypeProcFunc
    Representation of a (MiniObject-)Pascal procedure/function signature, containing formal parameters, result type, and binding (name).
    TypeRange
    Represents a Pascal subrange type.
    TypeRecord
    Representation of a (Mini-)Pascal record type.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ASTNode.VisitedState  
    MPCContext.Flag
    Enumeration for the command flags
    MPCScanner.Accept
    codes for accepting states, one for each kind of token initially scanned (an ID may turn out to be a keyword)
    MPCScanner.Action
    codes for actions that can happen at transitions
    MPCScanner.CharClass
    Character classes, i.e., equivalence classes of input letters
    MPCScanner.State
    the scanner is written as a finite state machine; this nested (but not "inner") class defines the information we associate with each state
    TokenKey
    TokenKey is used to represent a keyword in the Pascal language as defined by the Pascal User Manual and Report.
    TokenOp
    Represents all operator tokens in the Pascal language that are used in OO Mini-Pascal as defined by the Extended Pascal ISO document.
  • Error Summary 
    Error Description
    SemanticException

610 Pascal Compiler
